feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: I imagined that the monster seized me; I struggled furiously and fell down in a fit.

causedBy.name: Seeing the monster in his room

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: I clapped my hands for joy and ran down to Clerval.

feels.name: Remorse
feels.quote: I feel the greatest remorse for the disappointment of which I have been the occasion.

feels.name: Gratitude
feels.quote: how kind, how very good you are to me.

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: I felt my flesh tingle with excess of sensitiveness, and my pulse beat rapidly.

feels.name: Hope
feels.quote: I hope, I sincerely hope, that all these employments are now at an end and that I am at length free.

feels.name: Grief
feels.quote: I remember the first time I became capable of observing outward objects with any kind of pleasure, I perceived that the fallen leaves had disappeared and that the young buds were shooting forth from the trees that shaded my window.

Events.name: Seeing the monster in his room
